00060 #define DEFAULT_PAGE_SIZE 2048
00061 #define DEFAULT_NODE_DATA_PAGE_SIZE 1024
00062 #define INITIAL_PAGES 128

00065 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00066 /* Stucture declarations                                                     */

00068 
00069 /* data structure to store the information on each node. It keeps
00070  * the number of minterms represented by the DAG rooted at this node
00071  * in terms of the number of variables specified by the user, number
00072  * of nodes in this DAG and the number of nodes of its child with
00073  * lesser number of minterms that are not shared by the child with
00074  * more minterms
00075  */
00076 struct NodeData {
00077     double *mintermPointer;
00078     int *nodesPointer;
00079     int *lightChildNodesPointer;
00080 };
00081 
00082 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00083 /* Type declarations                                                         */
00084 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00085 
00086 typedef struct NodeData NodeData_t;
00087

00094 #endif

00106                                                    page */

00108                               * of variables */

00112 static  int             *currentLightNodePage; /* pointer to the

00125                                                      /* page size */

00181 DdNode *
00182 Cudd_SubsetHeavyBranch(
00183   DdManager * dd /* manager */,
00184   DdNode * f /* function to be subset */,
00185   int  numVars /* number of variables in the support of f */,
00186   int  threshold /* maximum number of nodes in the subset */)
00187 {
00188     DdNode *subset;
00189 
00190     memOut = 0;
00191     do {
00192         dd->reordered = 0;
00193         subset = cuddSubsetHeavyBranch(dd, f, numVars, threshold);
00194     } while ((dd->reordered == 1) && (!memOut));
00195 
00196     return(subset);
00197 
00198 } /* end of Cudd_SubsetHeavyBranch */
00199 
00200 
00231 DdNode *
00232 Cudd_SupersetHeavyBranch(
00233   DdManager * dd /* manager */,
00234   DdNode * f /* function to be superset */,
00235   int  numVars /* number of variables in the support of f */,
00236   int  threshold /* maximum number of nodes in the superset */)
00237 {
00238     DdNode *subset, *g;
00239 
00240     g = Cudd_Not(f);    
00241     memOut = 0;
00242     do {
00243         dd->reordered = 0;
00244         subset = cuddSubsetHeavyBranch(dd, g, numVars, threshold);
00245     } while ((dd->reordered == 1) && (!memOut));
00246     
00247     return(Cudd_NotCond(subset, (subset != NULL)));
00248     
00249 } /* end of Cudd_SupersetHeavyBranch */

00256 
00276 DdNode *
00277 cuddSubsetHeavyBranch(
00278   DdManager * dd /* DD manager */,
00279   DdNode * f /* current DD */,
00280   int  numVars /* maximum number of variables */,
00281   int  threshold /* threshold size for the subset */)
00282 {
00283 
00284     int i, *size;
00285     st_table *visitedTable;
00286     int numNodes;
00287     NodeData_t *currNodeQual;
00288     DdNode *subset;
00289     double minN;
00290     st_table *storeTable, *approxTable;
00291     char *key, *value;
00292     st_generator *stGen;
00293     
00294     if (f == NULL) {
00295         fprintf(stdout, "Cannot subset, nil object\n");
00296         return(NULL);
00297     }
00298 
00299     one  = Cudd_ReadOne(dd);
00300     zero = Cudd_Not(one);
00301 
00302     /* If user does not know numVars value, set it to the maximum
00303      * exponent that the pow function can take. The -1 is due to the
00304      * discrepancy in the value that pow takes and the value that
00305      * log gives.
00306      */
00307     if (numVars == 0) {
00308         /* set default value */
00309         numVars = DBL_MAX_EXP - 1;
00310     }
00311 
00312     if (Cudd_IsConstant(f)) {
00313         return(f);
00314     }
00315 
00316     max = pow(2.0, (double)numVars);
00317 
00318     /* Create visited table where structures for node data are allocated and
00319        stored in a st_table */
00320     visitedTable = SubsetCountMinterm(f, numVars);
00321     if ((visitedTable == NULL) || memOut) {
00322         (void) fprintf(stdout, "Out-of-memory; Cannot subset\n");
00323         return(0);
00324     }
00325     numNodes = SubsetCountNodes(f, visitedTable, numVars);
00326     if (memOut) {
00327         (void) fprintf(stdout, "Out-of-memory; Cannot subset\n");
00328         return(0);
00329     }
00330 
00331     if (st_lookup(visitedTable, (char *)f, (char **)&currNodeQual)) {
00332         minN = *(((NodeData_t *)currNodeQual)->mintermPointer);
00333     } else {
00334         fprintf(stdout, "Something is wrong, ought to be node quality table\n");
00335     }
00336 
00337     size = ALLOC(int, 1);
00338     if (size == NULL) {
00339         dd->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00340         return(NULL);
00341     }
00342     *size = numNodes;
00343 
00344 #ifdef DEBUG
00345     num_calls = 0;
00346 #endif
00347     /* table to store nodes being created. */
00348     storeTable = st_init_table(st_ptrcmp, st_ptrhash);
00349     /* insert the constant */
00350     cuddRef(one);
00351     if (st_insert(storeTable, (char *)Cudd_ReadOne(dd), NIL(char))== ST_OUT_OF_MEM ){
00352       fprintf(stdout, "Something wrong, st_table insert failed\n");
00353     }
00354     /* table to store approximations of nodes */
00355     approxTable = st_init_table(st_ptrcmp, st_ptrhash);
00356     subset = (DdNode *)BuildSubsetBdd(dd, f, size,
00357                visitedTable, threshold, storeTable, approxTable);
00358     if (subset != NULL) {
00359       cuddRef(subset);
00360     }
00361 
00362     stGen = st_init_gen(approxTable);
00363     if (stGen == NULL) {
00364         st_free_table(approxTable);
00365         return(NULL);
00366     }
00367     while(st_gen(stGen, (char **)&key, (char **)&value)) {
00368         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, (DdNode *)value);
00369     }
00370     st_free_gen(stGen); stGen = NULL;
00371     st_free_table(approxTable);
00372 
00373     stGen = st_init_gen(storeTable);
00374     if (stGen == NULL) {
00375         st_free_table(storeTable);
00376         return(NULL);
00377     }
00378     while(st_gen(stGen, (char **)&key, (char **)&value)) {
00379         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, (DdNode *)key);
00380     }
00381     st_free_gen(stGen); stGen = NULL;
00382     st_free_table(storeTable);
00383 
00384     for (i = 0; i <= page; i++) {
00385         FREE(mintermPages[i]);
00386     }
00387     FREE(mintermPages);
00388     for (i = 0; i <= page; i++) {
00389         FREE(nodePages[i]);
00390     }
00391     FREE(nodePages);
00392     for (i = 0; i <= page; i++) {
00393         FREE(lightNodePages[i]);
00394     }
00395     FREE(lightNodePages);
00396     for (i = 0; i <= nodeDataPage; i++) {
00397         FREE(nodeDataPages[i]);
00398     }
00399     FREE(nodeDataPages);
00400     st_free_table(visitedTable);
00401     FREE(size);
00402 #if 0
00403     (void) Cudd_DebugCheck(dd);
00404     (void) Cudd_CheckKeys(dd);
00405 #endif
00406 
00407     if (subset != NULL) {
00408 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00409       if (!Cudd_bddLeq(dd, subset, f)) {
00410             fprintf(stdout, "Wrong subset\n");
00411             exit(-1);
00412       }
00413 #endif
00414         cuddDeref(subset);
00415         return(subset);
00416     } else {
00417         return(NULL);
00418     }
00419 } /* end of cuddSubsetHeavyBranch */

00426 
00441 static void
00442 ResizeNodeDataPages(
00443    )
00444 {
00445     int i;
00446     NodeData_t **newNodeDataPages;
00447 
00448     nodeDataPage++;
00449     /* If the current page index is larger than the number of pages
00450      * allocated, allocate a new page array. Page numbers are incremented by
00451      * INITIAL_PAGES
00452      */
00453     if (nodeDataPage == maxNodeDataPages) {
00454         newNodeDataPages = ALLOC(NodeData_t *,maxNodeDataPages + INITIAL_PAGES);
00455         if (newNodeDataPages == NULL) {
00456             for (i = 0; i < nodeDataPage; i++) FREE(nodeDataPages[i]);
00457             FREE(nodeDataPages);
00458             memOut = 1;
00459             return;
00460         } else {
00461             for (i = 0; i < maxNodeDataPages; i++) {
00462                 newNodeDataPages[i] = nodeDataPages[i];
00463             }
00464             /* Increase total page count */
00465             maxNodeDataPages += INITIAL_PAGES;
00466             FREE(nodeDataPages);
00467             nodeDataPages = newNodeDataPages;
00468         }
00469     }
00470     /* Allocate a new page */
00471     currentNodeDataPage = nodeDataPages[nodeDataPage] =
00472         ALLOC(NodeData_t ,nodeDataPageSize);
00473     if (currentNodeDataPage == NULL) {
00474         for (i = 0; i < nodeDataPage; i++) FREE(nodeDataPages[i]);
00475         FREE(nodeDataPages);
00476         memOut = 1;
00477         return;
00478     }
00479     /* reset page index */
00480     nodeDataPageIndex = 0;
00481     return;
00482 
00483 } /* end of ResizeNodeDataPages */
00484 
00485 
00501 static void
00502 ResizeCountMintermPages(
00503    )
00504 {
00505     int i;
00506     double **newMintermPages;
00507 
00508     page++;
00509     /* If the current page index is larger than the number of pages
00510      * allocated, allocate a new page array. Page numbers are incremented by
00511      * INITIAL_PAGES
00512      */
00513     if (page == maxPages) {
00514         newMintermPages = ALLOC(double *,maxPages + INITIAL_PAGES);
00515         if (newMintermPages == NULL) {
00516             for (i = 0; i < page; i++) FREE(mintermPages[i]);
00517             FREE(mintermPages);
00518             memOut = 1;
00519             return;
00520         } else {
00521             for (i = 0; i < maxPages; i++) {
00522                 newMintermPages[i] = mintermPages[i];
00523             }
00524             /* Increase total page count */
00525             maxPages += INITIAL_PAGES;
00526             FREE(mintermPages);
00527             mintermPages = newMintermPages;
00528         }
00529     }
00530     /* Allocate a new page */
00531     currentMintermPage = mintermPages[page] = ALLOC(double,pageSize);
00532     if (currentMintermPage == NULL) {
00533         for (i = 0; i < page; i++) FREE(mintermPages[i]);
00534         FREE(mintermPages);
00535         memOut = 1;
00536         return;
00537     }
00538     /* reset page index */
00539     pageIndex = 0;
00540     return;
00541 
00542 } /* end of ResizeCountMintermPages */
00543 
00544 
00559 static void
00560 ResizeCountNodePages(
00561    )
00562 {
00563     int i;
00564     int **newNodePages;
00565 
00566     page++;
00567 
00568     /* If the current page index is larger than the number of pages
00569      * allocated, allocate a new page array. The number of pages is incremented
00570      * by INITIAL_PAGES.
00571      */
00572     if (page == maxPages) {
00573         newNodePages = ALLOC(int *,maxPages + INITIAL_PAGES);
00574         if (newNodePages == NULL) {
00575             for (i = 0; i < page; i++) FREE(nodePages[i]);
00576             FREE(nodePages);
00577             for (i = 0; i < page; i++) FREE(lightNodePages[i]);
00578             FREE(lightNodePages);
00579             memOut = 1;
00580             return;
00581         } else {
00582             for (i = 0; i < maxPages; i++) {
00583                 newNodePages[i] = nodePages[i];
00584             }
00585             FREE(nodePages);
00586             nodePages = newNodePages;
00587         }
00588 
00589         newNodePages = ALLOC(int *,maxPages + INITIAL_PAGES);
00590         if (newNodePages == NULL) {
00591             for (i = 0; i < page; i++) FREE(nodePages[i]);
00592             FREE(nodePages);
00593             for (i = 0; i < page; i++) FREE(lightNodePages[i]);
00594             FREE(lightNodePages);
00595             memOut = 1;
00596             return;
00597         } else {
00598             for (i = 0; i < maxPages; i++) {
00599                 newNodePages[i] = lightNodePages[i];
00600             }
00601             FREE(lightNodePages);
00602             lightNodePages = newNodePages;
00603         }
00604         /* Increase total page count */
00605         maxPages += INITIAL_PAGES;
00606     }
00607     /* Allocate a new page */
00608     currentNodePage = nodePages[page] = ALLOC(int,pageSize);
00609     if (currentNodePage == NULL) {
00610         for (i = 0; i < page; i++) FREE(nodePages[i]);
00611         FREE(nodePages);
00612         for (i = 0; i < page; i++) FREE(lightNodePages[i]);
00613         FREE(lightNodePages);
00614         memOut = 1;
00615         return;
00616     }
00617     /* Allocate a new page */
00618     currentLightNodePage = lightNodePages[page] = ALLOC(int,pageSize);
00619     if (currentLightNodePage == NULL) {
00620         for (i = 0; i <= page; i++) FREE(nodePages[i]);
00621         FREE(nodePages);
00622         for (i = 0; i < page; i++) FREE(lightNodePages[i]);
00623         FREE(lightNodePages);
00624         memOut = 1;
00625         return;
00626     }
00627     /* reset page index */
00628     pageIndex = 0;
00629     return;
00630 
00631 } /* end of ResizeCountNodePages */
00632 
00633 
00650 static double
00651 SubsetCountMintermAux(
00652   DdNode * node /* function to analyze */,
00653   double  max /* number of minterms of constant 1 */,
00654   st_table * table /* visitedTable table */)
00655 {
00656 
00657     DdNode      *N,*Nv,*Nnv; /* nodes to store cofactors  */
00658     double      min,*pmin; /* minterm count */
00659     double      min1, min2; /* minterm count */
00660     NodeData_t *dummy;
00661     NodeData_t *newEntry;
00662     int i;
00663 
00664 #ifdef DEBUG
00665     num_calls++;
00666 #endif
00667 
00668     /* Constant case */
00669     if (Cudd_IsConstant(node)) {
00670         if (node == zero) {
00671             return(0.0);
00672         } else {
00673             return(max);
00674         }
00675     } else {
00676 
00677         /* check if entry for this node exists */
00678         if (st_lookup(table,(char *)node, (char **)&dummy)) {
00679             min = *(dummy->mintermPointer);
00680             return(min);
00681         }
00682 
00683         /* Make the node regular to extract cofactors */
00684         N = Cudd_Regular(node);
00685 
00686         /* store the cofactors */
00687         Nv = Cudd_T(N);
00688         Nnv = Cudd_E(N);
00689         
00690         Nv = Cudd_NotCond(Nv, Cudd_IsComplement(node));
00691         Nnv = Cudd_NotCond(Nnv, Cudd_IsComplement(node));
00692 
00693         min1 =  SubsetCountMintermAux(Nv, max,table)/2.0;
00694         if (memOut) return(0.0);
00695         min2 =  SubsetCountMintermAux(Nnv,max,table)/2.0;
00696         if (memOut) return(0.0);
00697         min = (min1+min2);
00698 
00699         /* if page index is at the bottom, then create a new page */
00700         if (pageIndex == pageSize) ResizeCountMintermPages();
00701         if (memOut) {
00702             for (i = 0; i <= nodeDataPage; i++) FREE(nodeDataPages[i]);
00703             FREE(nodeDataPages);
00704             st_free_table(table);
00705             return(0.0);
00706         }
00707 
00708         /* point to the correct location in the page */
00709         pmin = currentMintermPage+pageIndex;
00710         pageIndex++;
00711 
00712         /* store the minterm count of this node in the page */
00713         *pmin = min;
00714 
00715         /* Note I allocate the struct here. Freeing taken care of later */
00716         if (nodeDataPageIndex == nodeDataPageSize) ResizeNodeDataPages();
00717         if (memOut) {
00718             for (i = 0; i <= page; i++) FREE(mintermPages[i]);
00719             FREE(mintermPages);
00720             st_free_table(table);
00721             return(0.0);
00722         }
00723 
00724         newEntry = currentNodeDataPage + nodeDataPageIndex;
00725         nodeDataPageIndex++;
00726 
00727         /* points to the correct location in the page */
00728         newEntry->mintermPointer = pmin;
00729         /* initialize this field of the Node Quality structure */
00730         newEntry->nodesPointer = NULL;
00731 
00732         /* insert entry for the node in the table */
00733         if (st_insert(table,(char *)node, (char *)newEntry) == ST_OUT_OF_MEM) {
00734             memOut = 1;
00735             for (i = 0; i <= page; i++) FREE(mintermPages[i]);
00736             FREE(mintermPages);
00737             for (i = 0; i <= nodeDataPage; i++) FREE(nodeDataPages[i]);
00738             FREE(nodeDataPages);
00739             st_free_table(table);
00740             return(0.0);
00741         }
00742         return(min);
00743     }
00744 
00745 } /* end of SubsetCountMintermAux */
00746 
00747 
00761 static st_table *
00762 SubsetCountMinterm(
00763   DdNode * node /* function to be analyzed */,
00764   int  nvars /* number of variables node depends on */)
00765 {
00766     st_table    *table;
00767     double      num;
00768     int i;
00769 
00770 
00771 #ifdef DEBUG
00772     num_calls = 0;
00773 #endif
00774 
00775     max = pow(2.0,(double) nvars);
00776     table = st_init_table(st_ptrcmp,st_ptrhash);
00777     if (table == NULL) goto OUT_OF_MEM;
00778     maxPages = INITIAL_PAGES;
00779     mintermPages = ALLOC(double *,maxPages);
00780     if (mintermPages == NULL) {
00781         st_free_table(table);
00782         goto OUT_OF_MEM;
00783     }
00784     page = 0;
00785     currentMintermPage = ALLOC(double,pageSize);
00786     mintermPages[page] = currentMintermPage;
00787     if (currentMintermPage == NULL) {
00788         FREE(mintermPages);
00789         st_free_table(table);
00790         goto OUT_OF_MEM;
00791     }
00792     pageIndex = 0;
00793     maxNodeDataPages = INITIAL_PAGES;
00794     nodeDataPages = ALLOC(NodeData_t *, maxNodeDataPages);
00795     if (nodeDataPages == NULL) {
00796         for (i = 0; i <= page ; i++) FREE(mintermPages[i]);
00797         FREE(mintermPages);
00798         st_free_table(table);
00799         goto OUT_OF_MEM;
00800     }
00801     nodeDataPage = 0;
00802     currentNodeDataPage = ALLOC(NodeData_t ,nodeDataPageSize);
00803     nodeDataPages[nodeDataPage] = currentNodeDataPage;
00804     if (currentNodeDataPage == NULL) {
00805         for (i = 0; i <= page ; i++) FREE(mintermPages[i]);
00806         FREE(mintermPages);
00807         FREE(nodeDataPages);
00808         st_free_table(table);
00809         goto OUT_OF_MEM;
00810     }
00811     nodeDataPageIndex = 0;
00812 
00813     num = SubsetCountMintermAux(node,max,table);
00814     if (memOut) goto OUT_OF_MEM;
00815     return(table);
00816 
00817 OUT_OF_MEM:
00818     (void) fprintf(stderr, "Out-of-memory; couldn't count BDD minterms.\n");
00819     memOut = 1;
00820     return(NULL);
00821 
00822 } /* end of SubsetCountMinterm */
00823 
00824 
00844 static int
00845 SubsetCountNodesAux(
00846   DdNode * node /* current node */,
00847   st_table * table /* table to update node count, also serves as visited table. */,
00848   double  max /* maximum number of variables */)
00849 {
00850     int tval, eval, i;
00851     DdNode *N, *Nv, *Nnv;
00852     double minNv, minNnv;
00853     NodeData_t *dummyN, *dummyNv, *dummyNnv, *dummyNBar;
00854     int *pmin, *pminBar, *val;
00855 
00856     if ((node == NULL) || Cudd_IsConstant(node))
00857         return(0);
00858 
00859     /* if this node has been processed do nothing */
00860     if (st_lookup(table, (char *)node, (char **)&dummyN) == 1) {
00861         val = dummyN->nodesPointer;
00862         if (val != NULL)
00863             return(0);
00864     } else {
00865         fprintf(stdout, "Something wrong, this node should exist in node quality table\n");
00866         return(0);
00867     }
00868 
00869     N  = Cudd_Regular(node);
00870     Nv = Cudd_T(N);
00871     Nnv = Cudd_E(N);
00872     
00873     Nv = Cudd_NotCond(Nv, Cudd_IsComplement(node));
00874     Nnv = Cudd_NotCond(Nnv, Cudd_IsComplement(node));
00875 
00876     /* find the minterm counts for the THEN and ELSE branches */
00877     if (Cudd_IsConstant(Nv)) {
00878         if (Nv == zero) {
00879             minNv = 0.0;
00880         } else {
00881             minNv = max;
00882         }
00883     } else {
00884         if (st_lookup(table, (char *)Nv, (char **)&dummyNv) == 1)
00885             minNv = *(dummyNv->mintermPointer);
00886         else {
00887             fprintf(stdout, "Something wrong, this node should exist in node quality table and is not constant\n");
00888             return(0);
00889         }
00890     }
00891     if (Cudd_IsConstant(Nnv)) {
00892         if (Nnv == zero) {
00893             minNnv = 0.0;
00894         } else {
00895             minNnv = max;
00896         }
00897     } else {
00898         if (st_lookup(table, (char *)Nnv, (char **)&dummyNnv) == 1) {
00899             minNnv = *(dummyNnv->mintermPointer);
00900         }
00901         else {
00902             fprintf(stdout, "Something wrong, this node should exist in node quality table and is not constant\n");
00903 
00904             return(0);
00905         }
00906     }
00907 
00908 
00909     /* recur based on which has larger minterm, */
00910     if (minNv >= minNnv) {
00911         tval = SubsetCountNodesAux(Nv, table, max);
00912         if (memOut) return(0);
00913         eval = SubsetCountNodesAux(Nnv, table, max);
00914         if (memOut) return(0);
00915 
00916         /* store the node count of the lighter child. */
00917         if (pageIndex == pageSize) ResizeCountNodePages();
00918         if (memOut) {
00919             for (i = 0; i <= page; i++) FREE(mintermPages[i]);
00920             FREE(mintermPages);
00921             for (i = 0; i <= nodeDataPage; i++) FREE(nodeDataPages[i]);
00922             FREE(nodeDataPages);
00923             st_free_table(table);
00924             return(0);
00925         }
00926         pmin = currentLightNodePage + pageIndex;
00927         *pmin = eval; /* Here the ELSE child is lighter */
00928         dummyN->lightChildNodesPointer = pmin;
00929 
00930     } else {
00931         eval = SubsetCountNodesAux(Nnv, table, max);
00932         if (memOut) return(0);
00933         tval = SubsetCountNodesAux(Nv, table, max);
00934         if (memOut) return(0);
00935 
00936         /* store the node count of the lighter child. */
00937         if (pageIndex == pageSize) ResizeCountNodePages();
00938         if (memOut) {
00939             for (i = 0; i <= page; i++) FREE(mintermPages[i]);
00940             FREE(mintermPages);
00941             for (i = 0; i <= nodeDataPage; i++) FREE(nodeDataPages[i]);
00942             FREE(nodeDataPages);
00943             st_free_table(table);
00944             return(0);
00945         }
00946         pmin = currentLightNodePage + pageIndex;
00947         *pmin = tval; /* Here the THEN child is lighter */
00948         dummyN->lightChildNodesPointer = pmin;
00949 
00950     }
00951     /* updating the page index for node count storage. */
00952     pmin = currentNodePage + pageIndex;
00953     *pmin = tval + eval + 1;
00954     dummyN->nodesPointer = pmin;
00955 
00956     /* pageIndex is parallel page index for count_nodes and count_lightNodes */
00957     pageIndex++;
00958 
00959     /* if this node has been reached first, it belongs to a heavier
00960        branch. Its complement will be reached later on a lighter branch.
00961        Hence the complement has zero node count. */
00962 
00963     if (st_lookup(table, (char *)Cudd_Not(node), (char **)&dummyNBar) == 1)  {
00964         if (pageIndex == pageSize) ResizeCountNodePages();
00965         if (memOut) {
00966             for (i = 0; i < page; i++) FREE(mintermPages[i]);
00967             FREE(mintermPages);
00968             for (i = 0; i < nodeDataPage; i++) FREE(nodeDataPages[i]);
00969             FREE(nodeDataPages);
00970             st_free_table(table);
00971             return(0);
00972         }
00973         pminBar = currentLightNodePage + pageIndex;
00974         *pminBar = 0;
00975         dummyNBar->lightChildNodesPointer = pminBar;
00976         /* The lighter child has less nodes than the parent.
00977          * So if parent 0 then lighter child zero
00978          */
00979         if (pageIndex == pageSize) ResizeCountNodePages();
00980         if (memOut) {
00981             for (i = 0; i < page; i++) FREE(mintermPages[i]);
00982             FREE(mintermPages);
00983             for (i = 0; i < nodeDataPage; i++) FREE(nodeDataPages[i]);
00984             FREE(nodeDataPages);
00985             st_free_table(table);
00986             return(0);
00987         }
00988         pminBar = currentNodePage + pageIndex;
00989         *pminBar = 0;
00990         dummyNBar->nodesPointer = pminBar ; /* maybe should point to zero */
00991 
00992         pageIndex++;
00993     }
00994     return(*pmin);
00995 } /*end of SubsetCountNodesAux */
00996 
00997 
01012 static int
01013 SubsetCountNodes(
01014   DdNode * node /* function to be analyzed */,
01015   st_table * table /* node quality table */,
01016   int  nvars /* number of variables node depends on */)
01017 {
01018     int num;
01019     int i;
01020 
01021 #ifdef DEBUG
01022     num_calls = 0;
01023 #endif
01024 
01025     max = pow(2.0,(double) nvars);
01026     maxPages = INITIAL_PAGES;
01027     nodePages = ALLOC(int *,maxPages);
01028     if (nodePages == NULL)  {
01029         goto OUT_OF_MEM;
01030     }
01031 
01032     lightNodePages = ALLOC(int *,maxPages);
01033     if (lightNodePages == NULL) {
01034         for (i = 0; i <= page; i++) FREE(mintermPages[i]);
01035         FREE(mintermPages);
01036         for (i = 0; i <= nodeDataPage; i++) FREE(nodeDataPages[i]);
01037         FREE(nodeDataPages);
01038         FREE(nodePages);
01039         goto OUT_OF_MEM;
01040     }
01041 
01042     page = 0;
01043     currentNodePage = nodePages[page] = ALLOC(int,pageSize);
01044     if (currentNodePage == NULL) {
01045         for (i = 0; i <= page; i++) FREE(mintermPages[i]);
01046         FREE(mintermPages);
01047         for (i = 0; i <= nodeDataPage; i++) FREE(nodeDataPages[i]);
01048         FREE(nodeDataPages);
01049         FREE(lightNodePages);
01050         FREE(nodePages);
01051         goto OUT_OF_MEM;
01052     }
01053 
01054     currentLightNodePage = lightNodePages[page] = ALLOC(int,pageSize);
01055     if (currentLightNodePage == NULL) {
01056         for (i = 0; i <= page; i++) FREE(mintermPages[i]);
01057         FREE(mintermPages);
01058         for (i = 0; i <= nodeDataPage; i++) FREE(nodeDataPages[i]);
01059         FREE(nodeDataPages);
01060         FREE(currentNodePage);
01061         FREE(lightNodePages);
01062         FREE(nodePages);
01063         goto OUT_OF_MEM;
01064     }
01065 
01066     pageIndex = 0;
01067     num = SubsetCountNodesAux(node,table,max);
01068     if (memOut) goto OUT_OF_MEM;
01069     return(num);
01070 
01071 OUT_OF_MEM:
01072     (void) fprintf(stderr, "Out-of-memory; couldn't count BDD nodes.\n");
01073     memOut = 1;
01074     return(0);
01075 
01076 } /* end of SubsetCountNodes */
01077 
01078 
01090 static void
01091 StoreNodes(
01092   st_table * storeTable,
01093   DdManager * dd,
01094   DdNode * node)
01095 {
01096   char *dummy;
01097   DdNode *N, *Nt, *Ne;
01098   if (Cudd_IsConstant(dd)) {
01099     return;
01100   }
01101   N = Cudd_Regular(node);
01102   if (st_lookup(storeTable, (char *)N, (char **)&dummy)) {
01103     return;
01104   }
01105   cuddRef(N);
01106   if (st_insert(storeTable, (char *)N, NIL(char)) == ST_OUT_OF_MEM) {
01107     fprintf(stdout, "Something wrong, st_table insert failed\n");
01108   }
01109   
01110   Nt = Cudd_T(N);
01111   Ne = Cudd_E(N);
01112 
01113   StoreNodes(storeTable, dd, Nt);
01114   StoreNodes(storeTable, dd, Ne);
01115   return;
01116             
01117 
01118   
01119 }
01120 
01137 static DdNode *
01138 BuildSubsetBdd(
01139   DdManager * dd /* DD manager */,
01140   DdNode * node /* current node */,
01141   int * size /* current size of the subset */,
01142   st_table * visitedTable /* visited table storing all node data */,
01143   int  threshold,
01144   st_table * storeTable,
01145   st_table * approxTable)
01146 {
01147 
01148     DdNode *Nv, *Nnv, *N, *topv, *neW;
01149     double minNv, minNnv;
01150     NodeData_t *currNodeQual;
01151     NodeData_t *currNodeQualT;
01152     NodeData_t *currNodeQualE;
01153     DdNode *ThenBranch, *ElseBranch;
01154     unsigned int topid;
01155     char *dummy;
01156 
01157 #ifdef DEBUG
01158     num_calls++;
01159 #endif
01160     /*If the size of the subset is below the threshold, dont do
01161       anything. */
01162     if ((*size) <= threshold) {
01163       /* store nodes below this, so we can recombine if possible */
01164       StoreNodes(storeTable, dd, node);
01165       return(node);
01166     }
01167 
01168     if (Cudd_IsConstant(node))
01169         return(node);
01170 
01171     /* look up minterm count for this node */
01172     if (!st_lookup(visitedTable, (char *)node, (char **)&currNodeQual)) {
01173         fprintf(stdout, "Something is wrong, ought to be in node quality table\n");
01174     }
01175 
01176     /* get children */
01177     N = Cudd_Regular(node);
01178     Nv = Cudd_T(N);
01179     Nnv = Cudd_E(N);
01180 
01181     /* complement if necessary */
01182     Nv = Cudd_NotCond(Nv, Cudd_IsComplement(node));
01183     Nnv = Cudd_NotCond(Nnv, Cudd_IsComplement(node));
01184 
01185     if (!Cudd_IsConstant(Nv)) {
01186         /* find out minterms and nodes contributed by then child */
01187         if (!st_lookup(visitedTable, (char *)Nv,
01188                        (char **)&currNodeQualT)) {
01189                 fprintf(stdout,"Something wrong, couldnt find nodes in node qualitytable\n");
01190                 return(NULL);
01191             }
01192         else {
01193             minNv = *(((NodeData_t *)currNodeQualT)->mintermPointer);
01194         }
01195     } else {
01196         if (Nv == zero) {
01197             minNv = 0;
01198         } else  {
01199             minNv = max;
01200         }
01201     }
01202     if (!Cudd_IsConstant(Nnv)) {
01203         /* find out minterms and nodes contributed by else child */
01204         if (!st_lookup(visitedTable, (char *)Nnv, (char **)&currNodeQualE)) {
01205             fprintf(stdout,"Something wrong, couldnt find nodes in node quality table\n");
01206             return(NULL);
01207         } else {
01208             minNnv = *(((NodeData_t *)currNodeQualE)->mintermPointer);
01209         }
01210     } else {
01211         if (Nnv == zero) {
01212             minNnv = 0;
01213         } else {
01214             minNnv = max;
01215         }
01216     }
01217 
01218     /* keep track of size of subset by subtracting the number of
01219      * differential nodes contributed by lighter child
01220      */
01221     *size = (*(size)) - (int)*(currNodeQual->lightChildNodesPointer);
01222     if (minNv >= minNnv) { /*SubsetCountNodesAux procedure takes
01223                              the Then branch in case of a tie */
01224 
01225         /* recur with the Then branch */
01226         ThenBranch = (DdNode *)BuildSubsetBdd(dd, Nv, size,
01227               visitedTable, threshold, storeTable, approxTable);
01228         if (ThenBranch == NULL) {
01229             return(NULL);
01230         }
01231         cuddRef(ThenBranch);
01232         /* The Else branch is either a node that already exists in the
01233          * subset, or one whose approximation has been computed, or
01234          * Zero.
01235          */
01236         if (st_lookup(storeTable, (char *)Cudd_Regular(Nnv), (char **)&dummy)) {
01237           ElseBranch = Nnv;
01238           cuddRef(ElseBranch);
01239         } else {
01240           if (st_lookup(approxTable, (char *)Nnv, (char **)&dummy)) {
01241             ElseBranch = (DdNode *)dummy;
01242             cuddRef(ElseBranch);
01243           } else {
01244             ElseBranch = zero;
01245             cuddRef(ElseBranch);
01246           }
01247         }
01248         
01249     }
01250     else {
01251         /* recur with the Else branch */
01252         ElseBranch = (DdNode *)BuildSubsetBdd(dd, Nnv, size,
01253                       visitedTable, threshold, storeTable, approxTable);
01254         if (ElseBranch == NULL) {
01255             return(NULL);
01256         }
01257         cuddRef(ElseBranch);
01258         /* The Then branch is either a node that already exists in the
01259          * subset, or one whose approximation has been computed, or
01260          * Zero.
01261          */
01262         if (st_lookup(storeTable, (char *)Cudd_Regular(Nv), (char **)&dummy)) {
01263           ThenBranch = Nv;
01264           cuddRef(ThenBranch);
01265         } else {
01266           if (st_lookup(approxTable, (char *)Nv, (char **)&dummy)) {
01267             ThenBranch = (DdNode *)dummy;
01268             cuddRef(ThenBranch);
01269           } else {
01270             ThenBranch = zero;
01271             cuddRef(ThenBranch);
01272           }
01273         }
01274     }
01275 
01276     /* construct the Bdd with the top variable and the two children */
01277     topid = Cudd_NodeReadIndex(N);
01278     topv = Cudd_ReadVars(dd, topid);
01279     cuddRef(topv);
01280     neW =  cuddBddIteRecur(dd, topv, ThenBranch, ElseBranch);
01281     if (neW != NULL) {
01282       cuddRef(neW);
01283     }
01284     Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, topv);
01285     Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, ThenBranch);
01286     Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, ElseBranch);
01287 
01288       
01289     if (neW == NULL)
01290         return(NULL);
01291     else {
01292         /* store this node in the store table */
01293         if (!st_lookup(storeTable, (char *)Cudd_Regular(neW), (char **)&dummy)) {
01294           cuddRef(neW);
01295           st_insert(storeTable, (char *)Cudd_Regular(neW), (char *)NIL(char));
01296           
01297         }
01298         /* store the approximation for this node */
01299         if (N !=  Cudd_Regular(neW)) {
01300             if (st_lookup(approxTable, (char *)node, (char **)&dummy)) {
01301                 fprintf(stdout, "This node shouldnt be in the approximated table\n");
01302             } else {
01303                 cuddRef(neW);
01304                 st_insert(approxTable, (char *)node, (char *)neW);
01305             }
01306         }
01307         cuddDeref(neW);
01308         return(neW);
01309     }
01310 } /* end of BuildSubsetBdd */
01311
Generated on Sat Aug 30 17:58:07 2014 for libbdd by  1.4.7
